quote: I now understood that real secrets were lonely. They planted themselves inside of you and expanded, until you felt like that was all you were-a lonely little secret, isolated in your experiences.
quote_letters: I NOW UNDERSTOOD THAT REAL SECRETS WERE LONELY THEY PLANTED THEMSELVES INSIDE OF YOU AND EXPANDED UNTIL YOU FELT LIKE THAT WAS ALL YOU WERE-A LONELY LITTLE SECRET ISOLATED IN YOUR EXPERIENCES
